creditline: The Ruth Ann Dayton Chinese Room Endowment Fund, The Suzanne S. Roberts Fund for Asian Art, and The Helen Jones Fund for Asian Art
description: short jacket with front opening with geometric embroidery and applied floral and bird tape in multicolors, especially red--also around shoulders and back of neck; standup collar with floral tape and gold thread trim; lined; similar geometric embroidery and tape in bands completely surrounding sleeves in multicolors; unlined body in blue and black fabric; knotted blue button and loop at neck
title: Jacket
